BST 260 Final Project
Group: Chuying Ma, Jingjing Tang, Jie Yin, Xuewei Zhang

This Rmd file is for data cleaning and aggregating BRFSS data into county level for the year 2002

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

library we need:
```{r}
library(SASxport)
library(maps)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
```

try to aggregate for the data in 2000
```{r}
data_02 = read.xport("~/Desktop/Harvard/fall 2017/bst260/project/cdbrfs02.xpt")
names(data_02)
```

select useful columns:
```{r}
dat_col_02 = data_02 %>%
  select(X.STATE,CTYCODE,IMONTH,MENTHLTH,CVDINFR2,CVDCRHD2,CVDSTRK2,ASTHMA2,AGE,SEX,ORACE2,EDUCA,INCOME2,MARITAL,EMPLOY,HLTHPLAN,EXERANY2,X.RFSMOK2,DRNKANY3,X.BMI2CAT,X.BMI2,GENHLTH,QLACTLM2)

```

create fips and create year variable:
```{r}
dat_col_02 = dat_col_02 %>%
  filter(!is.na(CTYCODE) & !is.na(X.STATE)) %>%
  mutate(fips = 1000* as.numeric(X.STATE) + as.numeric(CTYCODE)) %>%
  mutate(year = 2002) %>%
  select(fips, X.STATE,CTYCODE,IMONTH,MENTHLTH,CVDINFR2,CVDCRHD2,CVDSTRK2,ASTHMA2,AGE,SEX,ORACE2,EDUCA,INCOME2,MARITAL,EMPLOY,HLTHPLAN,EXERANY2,X.RFSMOK2,DRNKANY3,X.BMI2CAT,X.BMI2,GENHLTH,QLACTLM2)

```

start aggregate into county level:
1.start with menthlth
```{r}
menthlth = dat_col_02 %>%
  select(fips,MENTHLTH) %>%
  filter(!is.na(MENTHLTH) & MENTHLTH != 77 & MENTHLTH != 88 & MENTHLTH != 99) %>%
  group_by(fips) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(menthlth = mean(MENTHLTH))
```

2.hearattack
```{r}
count_fips = dat_col_02 %>%
  select(fips,CVDINFR2) %>%
  filter(!is.na(CVDINFR2) & CVDINFR2 != 7 & CVDINFR2 != 9) %>%
  group_by(fips) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(countF = n())
  
count_h = dat_col_02 %>%
  group_by(fips,CVDINFR2) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(n = n())

tab_heart = count_h %>% 
  left_join(count_fips,by = c('fips' = 'fips')) %>%
  mutate(hearattack = n/countF) %>%
  filter(!is.na(CVDINFR2) & CVDINFR2 == 1) %>%
  select(fips,hearattack)

```

more steps are needed to finalize the model since I didn't consider the presense of "777" and "999" in the CTYCODE
```{r,eval=FALSE}
data_2002 = read_csv("2002_data.csv")
data_2002 = data_2002 %>%
  filter(county != 777 & county != 999) %>%
  mutate(bmi_cts = bmi_cts/100) %>%
  select(-metro)

data_2002 = unique(data_2002)
write_csv(data_2002,"data_2002.csv")
```
